MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL29 postcode area of Colwyn Bay, affecting properties in Hillside Road, Rhiw Road and surrounding streets. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site currently investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.43pm on 13th of January 2021
